programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Two paranormal investigators are called upon to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a farmhouse.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep929
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: When a hapless architect breaks things off with his superhero girlfriend, he brings out the jealous and neurotic side of her in full force.

programme.title: Like Crazy
programme.desc: A British college student falls for an American student but finds out that they have to be separated.

programme.title: Into the Wild
programme.desc: A top student and athlete leaves his middle-class life to venture into Alaska, only to meet people who will eventually shape his values and life.

programme.title: Just Go With it
programme.desc: A man enlists the help of a woman and her kids to land the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Zack Snyder's epic fantasy takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her dark reality.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When celebrated war hero Jake Barnes is defeated by Brax, the indomitable leader of the invaders, the future of humanity hangs in the balance.

programme.title: The Invisible Man (2020)
programme.desc: After Cecilia escapes from a controlling relationship, her abusive ex-boyfriend commits suicide. She's sanity then unravels due to a series of eerie coincidences and the presence of someone nobody can see.
